headline.main: Deutsche Bank to Raise $8.5 Billion to Help Restructure Firm
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank to Raise $8.5 Billion to Help Restructure Firm

lead_paragraph: European banking giant Deutsche Bank announced plans to raise at least $8.5 billion in capital and sell off a stake in its asset management business, in a move to help shore up the troubled German firm.
snippet: European banking giant Deutsche Bank announced plans to raise at least $8.5 billion in capital and sell off a stake in its asset management business, in a move to help shore up the troubled German firm....
